aboutUs.title: About the Comprehensive Quranic Directory
aboutUs.subtitle: The World's Most Complete Guide to the Best Quran Applications
aboutUs.intro: Welcome to the Comprehensive Quranic Directory - the leading platform for discovering and evaluating the finest Islamic applications dedicated to serving the Holy Quran. With over 100 diverse free and premium applications, we're here to facilitate your journey in learning and contemplating the Book of Allah.
aboutUs.missionDescription: The Comprehensive Quranic Directory is an open-source project designed to serve Muslims worldwide by providing a comprehensive and trusted platform for collecting, categorizing, and evaluating digital applications related to the Holy Quran. We strive to facilitate access to the best technological solutions that serve the Book of Allah, whether in recitation, memorization, tafsir, tajweed, or other Quranic fields.
aboutUs.visionDescription: Our vision is to become the world's foremost and most trusted digital resource for Quranic applications, helping millions of Muslims worldwide connect with the Holy Quran and understand and contemplate it through the best modern technological methods.
